long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate product gathering and boost your online marketing with this powerful Chrome extension. It scrapes key details from product pages to build your personal spreadsheets, allowing you to save and share products!

- Save products from any agent you visit
- Use the new link converter to change these links if needed
- Streamline spreadsheet creation and customization 
- Export spreadsheet in various ways
- Link converter
- Telegram bot to automate sending products

This extension gets all the info you will need from a product page for your spreadsheet. 

- Product Name
- Price
- Product Photo
- QC Photo
- Your Affiliate Link
